alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Genesee; Northern Erie; Southern Erie; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 27 at 5:23PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY LAKE EFFECT SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF CHAUTAUQUA...CATTARAUGUS...ERIE...WYOMING...AND GENESEE COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy lake effect snow will continue to focus on the Buffalo Southtowns through early evening. Snowfall rates of up to 2 inches per hour are expected in this band, reducing visibility down to less than a quarter mile at times and producing snow covered, slippery roads. It will be a very slow and difficult commute across the Buffalo Southtowns this evening. This band of lake effect snow is expected to remain nearly stationary for a few more hours before moving south into the Southern Tier overnight. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... West Seneca, Dunkirk, Fredonia, Hamburg, East Aurora, Evans, Elma, Boston, Eden, Marilla, Perry, Warsaw, Bennington, Colden, Orchard Park, Silver Creek, Alden, and Blasdell. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 56 and 59. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
